articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sees Off Train Carrying Chinese Bodies, Wounded
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sees Off Train Carrying Chinese Bodies, Wounded
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un went to Pyongyang Railway Station on Wednesday night to see off a special purpose train carrying the bodies of Chinese who were killed and the wounded in a tragic traffic accident.
					 After being informed of a suggestion of Chinese comrades that the bodies and the wounded of China be sent to the Chinese proper as soon as possible, the respected Supreme Leader saw to it that the formation of a train was made and took measures to ensure that the bodies and the wounded were sent in a responsible manner, accompanied by leading officials of the Party and Government, technical officials and medical workers.
					
					 Kim Jong Un went to Pyongyang Railway Station on Wednesday night and learned about preparations for carrying the bodies and got on the train to meet again the wounded and offer them words of consolation.
					
					 At the railway station he met Li Jinjun, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and once again expressed deep condolences and apology to the bereave families of the victims over the unexpected, tragic disaster the close Chinese friends suffered in our land.
					
					 He said that he and the Party and Government are poignantly feeling the responsibility for the accident. Though he knows well neither word nor consolation nor compensation can allay the pain of the people who lost their beloved family members, he wanted to console the Chinese comrades even a bit with all efforts we can do, he said, and conveyed a consolatory message and money.
					
					 And he said that he would strictly investigate and handle the serious accident and take strong measures to thoroughly prevent the recurrence of such accident.
					
					 He saw off the train with a bitter grief together with Premier of the Cabinet Pak Pong Ju and other senior officials of the Party and Government.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Consolatory Message to Chinese Party and State Leaders
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Message of Consolation to Chinese Party and State Leaders
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, together with Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, and Pak Pong Ju, premier of the Cabinet of the DPRK, sent a message of consolation to Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and president of the People's Republic of China, Li Keqiang, premier of the State Council of the PRC, and Li Zhanshu, chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress of the PRC, on Wednesday.
					 The message reads:
					
					 We express the deepest condolences and apology to the Communist Party of China and the government of the People's Republic of China, all the Chinese people and the bereaved families of the victims as regards a tragic traffic accident in Pongsan County, North Hwanghae Province on April 22 which claimed casualties among many Chinese tourists .
					
					 It is, indeed, very sad that the close Chinese friends, who had come here with the feelings of friendship with our people, met with an unexpected accident on our land, and the WPK, the DPRK government and all the Korean people are overcome with sorrow with you, regarding this as damage their blood relatives suffered.
					
					 We make a deep apology to the Chinese comrades for the pain which cannot be alleviated with any word, consolation and compensation.
					
					 Our Party and Government will make every possible effort to ensure that hours of grief pass and the pains are alleviated even a bit at an early date.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Inspects Various Units
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Inspects Various Units
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, made a field survey of the Institute of Agricultural Science.
					 He encouraged the officials, scientists and technicians of the institute, who managed to manufacture a high-performance fertilizer molding machine badly needed for countryside, and called on them to wage a dynamic campaign for research and creation in order to push forward the agricultural front by dint of science and technology true to the spirit of the April Plenary Meeting of the Party Central Committee.
					
					 A consultative meeting held on the spot discussed the issues arising in rebuilding the institute on an expansion basis and making sure that the scientific research findings prove effective in agricultural production.
					
					 Earlier, the premier inspected the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex and the Ryongnam Dockyard to discuss the measures for consolidating the independent foundation of the chemical industry and increasing shipbuilding successes.

articles.title: Congratulations to PM of Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
Congratulations to PM of Kyrgyzstan
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, sent a congratulatory message to Muhammedkaliy Abulgaziyev upon his election as prime minister of the Republic of Kyrgyzstan on April 23.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Kyrgyzstan would develop in conformity with the interests of the two peoples, the message hoped that the prime minister would achieve success in his work for the development and prosperity of the country and wellbeing of its people.

articles.title: Iranian Embassy Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Iranian Embassy Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The Iranian embassy here hosted a reception on Thursday to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there on invitation were Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly, Thae Hyong Chol, minister of Higher Education who is president of Kim Il Sung University and chairman of the DPRK-Iran Friendship Parliamentary Group, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Ryu Myong Son, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Ik Song, director general of the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps, and officials concerned.
					
					 The Iranian ambassador and staff members of his embassy were on hand.
					
					 Seyed Mohsen Emadi, Iranian ambassador to the DPRK, said in his speech that Kim Il Sung paid deep attention to the development of the friendly relations between the DPRK and Iran, adding that the traditional friendly relations provided by the preceding leaders of the two countries have covered the path of development for many years.
					
					 He stressed that they heartily hope for the common prosperity and development of the two countries, referring to the reality of the DPRK steadily developing under the wise guidance of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok said it is an expression of deep reverence for Kim Il Sung that the friends of Iran have splendidly celebrated the Day of the Sun every year. It is also the reflection of the Iranian government and people's firm will to strengthen the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries, he added.
					
					 He stressed that the DPRK would as ever extend full support and solidarity to the just struggle of the Iranian government and people, expressing the stance of the DPRK government to expand the friendly and cooperative relations with Iran in various fields.

articles.title: Socialist Emulation for Transplanting Rice Seedlings Appealed
articles.content:
Socialist Emulation for Transplanting Rice Seedlings Appealed
 Anak, April 26 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held by agricultural workers at the Oguk Co-op Farm in Anak County, South Hwanghae Province on Thursday to appeal to those across the country to launch a socialist emulation for transplanting rice seedlings at the right time and in a proper way this year.
					 Attending the meeting were officials concerned and agricultural workers in the county.
					
					 Speeches followed a report made by Kim Chang Yop, chairman of the Central Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea, at the meeting.
					
					 The reporter and speakers called upon all members of the union and agricultural workers to beat the drum of great victory in the campaign for increasing the grain production this year, the third one for implementing the five-year strategy for national economic development, true to the Party's plan for building an economic power.
					
					 They appealed to all organizations of the union and agricultural workers across the country to launch a dynamic socialist emulation, expressing their determination to fulfill their duty as agricultural workers in carrying out the decisions of the Third Plenary Meeting of the Seventh Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Brazilian Lawmakers Here
articles.content:
Brazilian Lawmakers Here
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Brazilian senators, led by Fernando Collor, former president and head of the Foreign Affairs and National Defence Committee, arrived here on Thursday.

articles.title: Results of 2018 AFC Cup (East Asia)
articles.content:
Results of 2018 AFC Cup (East Asia)
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The second match between the April 25 Team of the DPRK and the Benfica Macao Team of Macao of China belonging to Group I (East Asia) of the 2018 AFC Cup was held in Macao of China on April 25.
					 The April 25 Team beat its rival 2:0 at the away match, taking the first place in the group with four wins in four matches.
					
					 An Il Bom scored at around 24 minutes and 31 minutes.
					
					 The April 25 Team overwhelmed the Benfica Macao Team 8:0 at the home match.
					
					 The team will compete with the Hwaebul Team of the DPRK on May 2 and the Hang Yuen Team of China's Taipei on May 16 in Pyongyang.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Hwaebul Team beat the Hang Yuen Team 2:0 in the second match held in Taipei of China on April 25.

articles.title: WIDF Chairwoman Leaves
articles.content:
WIDF Chairwoman Leaves
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Chairwoman of the Women's International Democratic Federation (WIDF) Lorena Pena, women delegations and delegates from Namibia, Mexico, Brazil, Sahara, Cuba, Columbia, Portugal and El Salvador left here on Thursday after taking part in WIDF meetings.
					Departing earlier were women delegations and delegates from Greece, Venezuela, Pakistan, Turkey, Argentina, Angola, Italy and Vietnam.

articles.title: Home-Visiting Group of Koreans in Japan Here
articles.content:
Home-Visiting Group of Koreans in Japan Here
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- A home-visiting group of Koreans in Japan led by Jong Hyon arrived here on Thursday.

articles.title: Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Leaves
articles.content:
Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Leaves
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the Day of the Sun led by Ri Ki Sok, adviser of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, left here on Thursday.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Derides S. Korean Conservatives' Ugly Behavior
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Derides S. Korean Conservatives' Ugly Behavior
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The conservative camp of south Korea including the "Liberal Korea Party" is making a last-ditch effort with the upcoming elections to the local self-governing bodies.
					 It is crying out for "punishing the left-wing government", branding the ruling Minju Party as a "party of hypocrites and criminals".
					
					 Some conservatives are siding with the LPK against the conservatives of the "Parun Party" while some of them are serving both of them or some are scrambling for the "origin of conservatism".
					
					 Painting a black picture of the steps taken by the DPRK for repairing the inter-Korean relations, the conservatives are so impudent as to say that they "would closely watch" the behavior of the regime, accusing the chief executive of south Korea of "being led by the north."
					
					 Such desperate moves of the conservative group to scuttle the very important affair of the nation and spoil the south Korean society are just stupid acts to reverse its unfavorable electoral situation at any cost.
					
					 Besmirching, red herring operation, politically-motivated union and parting and scramble for taking initiative are trite methods of the conservatives. Their worn-out racket based on "coloring theory" is an inveterate evil habit manifested by them whenever election begins in south Korea.
					
					 The conservative group is working hard to tide over its inferiority during the election by employing all means and methods they have so far cultivated but the die is cast.
					
					 The ruin of the conservatives was heralded already when the worst-ever traitor Park Geun Hye was forsaken and punished by the public.
					
					 The "rate of supporting" the parties of traitors at rock bottom has become a matter of concern over their future.
					
					 No matter how frequently the LPK, the successor to the "Saenuri party", and the "Parun party" which is little short of its faction, beautify themselves and pay lip service, no south Korean will be taken in by them.
					
					 That's because the south Koreans suffered untold misfortune and pain under the decade-long rule by the regimes of traitors.
					
					 The south Korean people claim that they wish they could cut off their fingers with which they cast the ballots for Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye as they were deceived by their lip service. It is as clear as noonday that such people would never choose the road which will bring them back to the dark past.
					
					 This being a hard fact, the traitors, who completely ruined the north-south relations and treated the south Korean people like animals, are mocking the public who once turned out in a candlelight demonstration to oust the traitorous chief executive. This is, indeed, shameless.
					
					 The desperate moves of the conservative group only prove their sense of foreboding that they would suffer a heavy defeat in the elections.
					
					 The conservatives are already acknowledging their defeat.
					
					The LPK and other conservative group of south Korea should stand trial, instead of running for the elections.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Conservatives' Anti-Reunification Moves
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Conservatives' Anti-Reunification Moves
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The conservative group of south Korea is working hard to stoke discord and antagonism among compatriots while painting a black picture of the DPRK's positive efforts for mending the inter-Korean relations, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article.
					 Terming the reckless moves of the conservative group an unpardonable crime against the nation which is aimed to chill the hard-won atmosphere of improved north-south relations at any cost and carry out a sinister political design, the daily goes on:
					
					 Historically, the conservative coteries of south Korea have gotten desperate in escalating confrontation with the compatriots whenever the atmosphere of the north-south relations grows strong as they were displeased with the national reconciliation, unity and reunification.
					
					 They are now getting desperate in hurling mud at the DPRK, manifesting their bad habit again. Such behavior is peculiar to the ugly traitors who are working hard to attain their partisan interests only in disregard of the destiny of the nation and the great event of the nation.
					
					 The anti-reunification forces who are desperately going against the current trend of the national history, regarding the north-south relations as a plaything for attaining their politically-motivated wild ambition, can never escape the curses by the public and stern punishment by history.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded Abroad
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Meetings for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung were held in Switzerland, Denmark, Norway, Germany, Luxembourg, Thailand and Libya from April 5 to 7.
					 The chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee praised Kim Il Sung for working energetically for the happiness of the Korean people, the country's reunification and the global cause of independence all his life.
					
					 The chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association said that the President made a titanic contribution for the country and its people, the times and history and his exploits would be immortal along with the cause of independence steadily making progress.
					
					 The chairman of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway said the President as a prominent thinker-theoretician who founded the immortal Juche idea after embarking on the road of revolution in his teens.
					
					 Speakers at the meeting in Germany praised the President as the eternal sun of humankind and the peerlessly great man who defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialists in one generation and built a genuine people's country in Korea.
					
					 The secretary general of the Sunbula International Friendship Club of Libya said that the exploits of Kim Il Sung, who turned the DPRK into a socialist fortress independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence, will shine forever in history.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings in Switzerland, Norway and Germany.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Russian Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Russian Website
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Russian internet news Erofei-Deve introduced the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" on April 9 to mark the Day of the Sun.
					 The work, published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the revolutionary exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in their lives.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for staunchly defending and adding eternal luster to the idea and feats of the great leaders.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un despide el tren de cadaveres y lesionados chinos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un despide el tren de cadaveres y lesionados chinos
Pyongyang, 26 de abril (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un despidio por la noche del 25 de abril en la Estacion Ferroviaria de Pyongyang el tren de uso exclusivo para transportar los cadaveres de los chinos muertos en un tragico accidente de trafico y los heridos.
					Informado de que los companeros chinos propusieron enviar con prisa los cadaveres y heridos chinos al territorio chino, el instruyo formar el tren exclusivo para el transporte y tomo las medidas para asegurar con responsabilidad el envio mediante el acompanamiento de los cuadros directivos del partido y el gobierno, los expertos y los medicos.
					
					Por la noche del dia 25, averiguo en la Estacion Ferroviaria de Pyongyang los preparativos de transporte de los cadaveres y se encontro otra vez en tren con los heridos chinos dandoles consuelo.
					
					Se reunio en la estacion con el embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de Republica Popular China en Corea, Li Jinjun, y volvio a expresar profundo pesar y excusa a los familiares de victimas por esa tragedia inesperada ocurrida en la tierra coreana.
					
					Dijo que el y el partido y el gobierno sienten en carne propia la responsabilidad del accidente y saben bien que no pueden apaciguar con ninguna palabra y consuelo o recompensa el dolor de los que perdieron a sus familiares queridos.
					
					Ahora pensamos solo en como moderar el dolor de los companeros chinos haciendo todo lo que podamos, dijo y entrego al embajador el mensaje y el dinero de consuelo.
					
					Continuo que se exigira el rigor en la investigacion y el tratamiento de este grave accidente y se tomaran las fuertes medidas para prevenir la repeticion.
					
					Y despidio con afliccion el tren junto con el premier Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros del partido y el gobierno.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de consuelo a lideres del partido y el Estado de China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de consuelo a lideres del partido y el Estado de China
Pyongyang, 26 de abril (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 25 junto con el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Kim Yong Nam, y el premier Pak Pong Ju un mensaje de consuelo a Xi Jinping, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y Presidente de la Republica Popular China, Li Keqiang, primer ministro del Consejo de Estado de la RPCh, y Li Zhanshu, presidente del Comite Permanente de la Asamblea Popular Nacional de la RPCh.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					En relacion con que numerosos turistas chinos murieron a causa de un tragico accidente de trafico ocurrido el 22 de abril en el distrito de Pongsan de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte, expresamos el mas profundo pesar y excusa al Partido Comunista de China, el gobierno de la RPCh, todo el pueblo chino y los familiares de victimas.
					
					Es muy doloroso que los amigos chinos, quienes vinieron aqui como mensajeros de amistad, hayan sufrido en la tierra coreana ese accidente inesperado.
					
					El PTC, el gobierno de la RPDC y todo el pueblo coreano se sienten muy entristecidos junto con ustedes considerando el siniestro como el acaecido a los parientes propios.
					
					Nos sentimos penitentes por haberles causado a los companeros chinos el dolor irreparable con ninguna palabra y consuelo o recompensa.
					
					Nuestro partido y gobierno haran todo lo posible por que pasen cuanto antes estos momentos tristes y se alivie, aunque en lo minimo, ese dolor.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju recorre varias unidades
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju recorre varias unidades
Pyongyang, 26 de abril (ACNC) -- Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado y premier del Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC, recorrio el Instituto de Agricultura.
					El estimulo a los funcionarios, cientificos y tecnicos del instituto quienes inventaron la eficiente maquina de modelar de abono que se urge en el campo rural y dio enfasis a la necesidad de librar la campana de investigacion y creacion para desarrollar la agricultura del pais con la ayuda de ciencias y tecnicas, en pleno acato al espiritu del Pleno de Abril del Comite Central del PTC.
					
					En la reunion consultiva convocada en el terreno, se discutieron los problemas de remodelar y ampliar el instituto e implementar los exitos de investigacion cientifica, ya logrados, en la produccion de agricultura.
					
					Con anterioridad, el premier estuvo en el Complejo Quimico Juventud de Namhung y el Astillero de Ryongnam, donde tomo las medidas necesarias para fortalecer la base independiente de la industria quimica y construir mas barcos.

articles.title: Trabajadores agricolas deciden terminar a tiempo la trasplantacion de posturas de arroz
articles.content:
Trabajadores agricolas deciden terminar a tiempo la trasplantacion de posturas de arroz
Anak, 26 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 26 en la Granja Cooperativa de Oguk del distrito de Anak de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur el mitin de los trabajadores agricolas para llamar a sus colegas de todo el pais a la emulacion socialista destinada a terminar a tiempo y de modo cualitativo la trasplantacion de las posturas de arroz en este ano.
					Tomaron parte en el acto los funcionarios de los sectores interesados y los trabajadores agricolas en el distrito citado.
					
					Kim Chang Yop, presidente del Comite Central de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas de Corea, pronuncio el informe de la ocasion y otros intervinieron.
					
					Los oradores exhortaron a todos los miembros de la UTAC y trabajadores agricolas a lograr abundante cosecha de cereales en este ano, el tercero para el cumplimiento de la Estrategia Quinquenal para el desarrollo de la economia nacional, segun el proyecto del partido de construir una potencia economica.
					
					Expresaron la decision de cumplir con su mision en la materializacion de las resoluciones del Tercer Pleno del Septimo Periodo del CC del PTC y llamaron a todas las organizaciones de la UTAC y a los trabajadores agricolas del pais desarrollar la emulacion mencionada.

articles.title: Delegacion de senador de Brasil llega a Pyongyang
articles.content:
Delegacion de senador de Brasil llega a Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 26 de abril (ACNC) -- Llego el dia 26 a esta capital la delegacion de senador del Congreso Nacional de Brasil, encabezada por Fernando Collor, ex presidente de Brasil y presidente del Comite de RR.EE. y Defensa Nacional de Senado del Congreso Nacional de Brasil.
